description:
Now for something completely different!
How about a 69-minute update with no breaks and no cuts; one "live" take. All tying and untying, all the action of a "live show" from start to finish. Harmony is our subject and pulls off the long non-stop shoot with honors. In this shoot you'll find great foot torture, tickle torture, multiple orgasms, and another category five suspension. Harmony endures, Harmony rules.
title: Harmony
